items.summary: Update the PaymentSuccess component to display a two-tone background with green covering the top 1/3 of the screen and white covering the bottom 2/3

Position the text 'Paid to [recipient name]' at the top-center of the white background section in the PaymentSuccess component, where [recipient name] is replaced with the actual receiver name from the payment form
Keep the existing green checkmark tick circle exactly as it is in the PaymentSuccess component, maintaining its current position, size, and styling
Add a 'Paid from [Sender name]' text field in the lower portion of the white background area in the PaymentSuccess component, where [Sender name] is a placeholder or user-entered value
Add the text 'HDFC Bank XXXX XXXX 7128' directly below the 'Paid from [Sender name]' text in the PaymentSuccess component
Add a Transaction ID field below the bank details in the PaymentSuccess component that allows users to manually enter or view a transaction ID
